                node.neg_day = -day;
                node.neg_salary = -salary;
                push_x(heap_x, node);
            }

            // Create heap_y with capacity n
            MinHeapY* heap_y = createMinHeapY(n);

            long long total_salary = 0;

            // Process all jobs from heap_x
            while (heap_x->size > 0) {
                NodeX job = pop_x(heap_x);
                int day = -job.neg_day;
                int salary = -job.neg_salary;

                int r = m - heap_y->size;   // available days before adding this job

                push_y(heap_y, salary);
                total_salary += salary;

                // If we didn't have enough available days, then we remove the smallest salary from heap_y
                if (r < day) {
                    int small = pop_y(heap_y);
                    total_salary -= small;
                }
            }

            // Now, total_salary is the integer result from the first program.

            // Convert total_salary to a string
            char S[21]; // enough for 64-bit integer (max 20 digits)
            int len = sprintf(S, "%lld", total_salary);

            // Now, run the second program on the string S
            int freq[10] = {0};   // frequencies for digits 0-9

            for (int i = 0; i < len; i++) {
                char c = S[i];
                if (c >= '0' && c <= '9') {
                    freq[c - '0']++;
                }
            }

            int distinct_count = 0;
            for (int i = 0; i < 10; i++) {
                if (freq[i] > 0) {
                    distinct_count++;
                }
            }

            if (distinct_count != 2) {
                printf("No\n");
            } else {
                int valid = 1;
                for (int i = 0; i < 10; i++) {
                    if (freq[i] > 0 && freq[i] != 2) {
                        valid = 0;
                        break;
                    }
                }
                if (valid) {
                    printf("Yes\n");
                } else {
                    printf("No\n");
                }
            }

            // Free memory
            free(heap_x->arr);
            free(heap_x);
            free(heap_y->arr);
            free(heap_y);

            return 0;
        }

        Now, we need to implement the heap functions.

        For MinHeapX:

            MinHeapX* createMinHeapX(int capacity) {
                MinHeapX* heap = (MinHeapX*)malloc(sizeof(MinHeapX));
                heap->capacity = capacity;
                heap->size = 0;
                heap->arr = (NodeX*)malloc(capacity * sizeof(NodeX));
                return heap;
            }

            void push_x(MinHeapX* heap, NodeX element) {
                if (heap->size == heap->capacity) {
                    // expand? but we know capacity is n, so we don't expect to exceed? 
                    return;
                }
                heap->arr[heap->size] = element;
                heap->size++;
                heapify_up_x(heap, heap->size-1);
            }

            void heapify_up_x(MinHeapX* heap, int idx) {
                int parent = (idx-1)/2;
                while (idx > 0 && 
                       (heap->arr[idx].neg_day < heap->arr[parent].neg_day ||
                        (heap->arr[idx].neg_day == heap->arr[parent].neg_day && 
                         heap->arr[idx].neg_salary < heap->arr[parent].neg_salary))) {
                    // swap
                    NodeX temp = heap->arr[idx];
                    heap->arr[idx] = heap->arr[parent];
                    heap->arr[parent] = temp;
                    idx = parent;
                    parent = (idx-1)/2;
                }
            }

            NodeX pop_x(MinHeapX* heap) {
                NodeX ret = heap->arr[0];
                heap->arr[0] = heap->arr[heap->size-1];
                heap->size--;
                heapify_down_x(heap, 0);
                return ret;
            }

            void heapify_down_x(MinHeapX* heap, int idx) {
                int left = 2*idx+1;
                int right = 2*idx+2;
                int smallest = idx;

                if (left < heap->size) {
                    if (heap->arr[left].neg_day < heap->arr[smallest].neg_day) {
                        smallest = left;
                    } else if (heap->arr[left].neg_day == heap->arr[smallest].neg_day) {
                        if (heap->arr[left].neg_salary < heap->arr[smallest].neg_salary) {
                            smallest = left;
                        }
                    }
                }

                if (right < heap->size) {
                    if (heap->arr[right].neg_day < heap->arr[smallest].neg_day) {
                        smallest = right;
                    } else if (heap->arr[right].neg_day == heap->arr[smallest].neg_day) {
                        if (heap->arr[right].neg_salary < heap->arr[smallest].neg_salary) {
                            smallest = right;
                        }
                    }
                }

                if (smallest != idx) {
                    NodeX temp = heap->arr[idx];
                    heap->arr[idx] = heap->arr[smallest];
                    heap->arr[smallest] = temp;
                    heapify_down_x(heap, smallest);
                }
            }

        Similarly, for MinHeapY (min-heap for integers):

            MinHeapY* createMinHeapY(int capacity) {
                MinHeapY* heap = (MinHeapY*)malloc(sizeof(MinHeapY));
                heap->capacity = capacity;
                heap->size = 0;
                heap->arr = (int*)malloc(capacity * sizeof(int));
                return heap;
            }

            void push_y(MinHeapY* heap, int element) {
                if (heap->size == heap->capacity) return;
                heap->arr[heap->size] = element;
                heap->size++;
                heapify_up_y(heap, heap->size-1);
            }

            void heapify_up_y(MinHeapY* heap, int idx) {
                int parent = (idx-1)/2;
                while (idx > 0 && heap->arr[idx] < heap->arr[parent]) {
                    int temp = heap->arr[idx];
                    heap->arr[idx] = heap->arr[parent];
                    heap->arr[parent] = temp;
                    idx = parent;
                    parent = (idx-1)/2;
                }
            }

            int pop_y(MinHeapY* heap) {
                int ret = heap->arr[0];
                heap->arr[0] = heap->arr[heap->size-1];
                heap->size--;
                heapify_down_y(heap, 0);
                return ret;
            }

            void heapify_down_y(MinHeapY* heap, int idx) {
                int left = 2*idx+1;
                int right = 2*idx+2;
                int smallest = idx;

                if (left < heap->size && heap->arr[left] < heap->arr[smallest]) {
                    smallest = left;
                }
                if (right < heap->size && heap->arr[right] < heap->arr[smallest]) {
                    smallest = right;
                }
                if (smallest != idx) {
                    int temp = heap->arr[idx];
                    heap->arr[idx] = heap->arr[smallest];
                    heap->arr[smallest] = temp;
                    heapify_down_y(heap, smallest);
                }
            }
